RTCOutboundRtpStreamStatsKind.summary: The kind property of the dictionary is a string indicating whether the described {{Glossary("RTP")}} stream contains audio or video media.

remarks.para:
This string will always be the same as the of the object carried by the stream.
It will also match the media type of the codec associated with this statistics objects (i.e. the MIME type of the associated codec's property).

RTCOutboundRtpStreamStatsKind.value: The kind is always one of:
